name: COUSCOUS SALAD
ingredients:
- 1 1/2 cups of water 
- 1 box of instant couscous (with spices)  
- 12 cherry tomatoes (or 2 regular tomatoes) 
- 1/2 cup of drained canned spinach 
- Salt and pepper
instructions:
- Boil water in a saucepan, add couscous, and cook the couscous with the directions from the box.  
- In a separate pan heat up the spinach and dry it.  
- Add the spinach, tomatoes, and salt and pepper (to taste) into the couscous and serve.

name: TURKEY BURGERS
ingredients:
- 1/2 cup of breadcrumbs  
- 1 cup of milk  
- 3 tablespoons of ketchup  
- 1 egg 
- 1/2 tablespoon of salt  
- 1/2 tablespoon of pepper 
- 1 pound of ground turkey  
- 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil  
- 4 buns (or 8 slices of bread)
instructions:
- In a bowl, combine breadcrumbs and milk and stir. 
-  Next, add ketchup, egg, salt, and pepper and stir. 
- Then, add the turkey and mix the ingredients.  
- Divide the mixture into 4 patties.  
- Add the vegetable oil to a frying pan on medium-low. Place the patties into the pan and cook each side for about 5-7 minutes or until the turkey burgers are no longer pink in the middle.  
- Place the cooked patties on the buns and serve.

name: FETTUCCINE ALFREDO
ingredients:
- 6 quarts of water 
-  Salt and pepper 
- 1 pound of fettuccine pasta 
- 2 cups of heavy cream  
- 1 cup of parmesan cheese 
- 1 cup of drained canned peas
instructions:
- Boil the water in pot and add the pasta.  
- Cook the pasta for about 9 minutes and stir occasionally.  
- Once the pasta is cooked, drain the pasta and place back into the pot.  
- In a pan, add the cream and boil on high heat. Then reduce the heat to medium and stir of 5 minutes until the sauce is thick.  
- Add the cream, parmesan cheese, peas, salt, and pepper to the pasta in the pot and stir for three minutes.  
- Put into bowls and serve.

name: BEEF TOSTADAS
ingredients:
- 4 flour tortillas 
- 1/2 pound of ground beef 
- 1 can of black beans 
- 1/2 cup of salsa 
- 1/2 cup of cheese 
- 1/2 of shredded lettuce (optional)  
- 1 tomato (optional) 
- 1/2 cup of sour cream (optional)
instructions:
- Heat oven to 400 degrees, place tortillas on a cooking sheet and bake for 7-8 minutes.  
- In a large pan, cook the ground beef until brown and add beans and salsa. Cook for 4 minutes and then add 1/2 cup of cheese. 
- Place the mixture on top of the tortillas and add the other 1/2 cup of cheese, and the lettuce, diced tomatoes, and sour cream.

name: CHICKEN & RICE CASSEROLE
ingredients:
- 4 chicken breasts 
- 1 cup of rice (brown or white)  
- 1 package of onion soup mix 
- 1 can of cream of mushroom soup
instructions:
- Heat oven to 350 degrees. 
- Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper and place them in a 9x13 pan. 
- Pour the uncooked rice over the chicken and add the onion soup mix.  
- Combine the mushroom soup and 1 1/2 cups of water and pour over chicken.  
- Cover the pan with its lid and cook for 1 hour and 15 minutes.  
- Remove from oven, let cool, and serve.

name: CHICKEN TORTILLA SOUP
ingredients:
- 1 can of black beans (drained)  
- 1 can of chicken broth  
- 1 can of corn 
- 1 can of chicken (drained)  
- 1 can of cream of chicken soup  
- 1 can of mixed diced tomato with green chile peppers
instructions:
- Stir the black beans, chicken broth, corn, chicken chunks, cream of chicken soup, and diced tomatoes with green chile peppers together in a pan.  
- Bring the mixture to a boil over medium-high heat.  
- Reduce the heat the low and cook for 20 minutes 
- Spoon the soup into bowls and serve.

name: MINI MEATLOAF
ingredients:
- 1 egg 
- 1/2 cup of milk  
- 1 cup of cheddar cheese 
-  1/2 cup of quick cooking oats 
- 1 teaspoon of salt 
- 1 pound of ground beef 
- ? cup of ketchup  
- 1/2 cup of brown sugar 
- 1 1/2 teaspoons of mustard
instructions:
- Heat oven to 350 degrees.  
- In a bowl, mix the egg, milk, cheese, oats, and salt. Then add the ground beef and mix. 
-  Form the mixture into 8 mini meatloaves and place them in a 9x13 pan. 
- In another bowl, mix the ketchup, brown sugar, and mustard. Stir and spread over each mini meatloaf.  
- Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes.  
- Take out of the oven, cool, and serve.

name: SALMON CAKES
ingredients:
- 1 can of drained salmon 
- 2 eggs  
- 1 small onion (diced)  
- 1 teaspoon of pepper 
- 3 tablespoons of vegetable oil
instructions:
- In a mixing bowl, beat the two eggs and add the diced onion, salmon, and pepper and mix.   
- Shape the mixture into 7-8 patties 
- In a pan over medium heat, heat the oil and fry each patty for 5 minutes on each side or until crispy. 
- Remove from pan and serve.

name: OVEN FRIED CHICKEN
ingredients:
- 4 chicken breasts (cut in half)  
- 2 cups of corn flakes 
- 1 cup of milk
instructions:
- Dip the chicken in the milk  
- Roll the chicken in the corn flake crumbs 
- Bake at 350 for 45 minutes to 1 hour. 
- Remove from oven and serve.

name: SALSA CHICKEN
ingredients:
- 4 chicken breasts (cut in half)  
- 4 teaspoons of taco seasoning 
- 1 cup of salsa 
- 1 cup of cheddar cheese
instructions:
- Heat the oven to 375 degrees. 
- Place the chicken in a 9x13 pan, sprinkle on taco seasoning (on both sides of the chicken) and cover in salsa.  
- Bake for 25-35 minutes or until the chicken is no longer pink on the inside. 
- Sprinkle the chicken with cheese and continue to bake for another 3-5 minutes.  
- Take out of the oven and serve.
